an9.34:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
an9.34:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an9.34:1.5: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an9.34:1.6: “kim panettha, avuso sariputta, sukham yadettha natthi vedayitan”ti?
an9.34:1.7: “Etadeva khvettha, avuso, sukham yadettha natthi vedayitam.
an9.34:1.10: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
an9.34:1.14: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
an9.34:1.16: Yam kho, avuso, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, idam vuccatavuso, kamasukham.
an9.34:2.1: Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:2.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato kamasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:2.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:2.4: evamevassa te kamasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:2.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:2.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:3.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:3.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato vitakkasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:3.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:3.4: evamevassa te vitakkasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:3.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:3.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:4.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:4.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato pitisahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:4.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:4.4: evamevassa te pitisahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:4.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:4.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:5.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:5.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato upekkhasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:5.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:5.4: evamevassa te upekkhasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:5.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:5.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:6.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ananto akasoti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:6.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato rupasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:6.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:6.4: evamevassa te rupasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:6.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:6.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:7.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:7.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato akasanancayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:7.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:7.4: evamevassa te akasanancayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:7.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:7.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:8.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma, natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:8.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato vinnanancayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:8.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:8.4: evamevassa te vinnanancayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:8.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:8.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:9.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:9.2: Tassa ce, avuso, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato akincannayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti, svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:9.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, sukhino dukkham uppajjeyya yavadeva abadhaya;
an9.34:9.4: evamevassa te akincannayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti. Svassa hoti abadho.
an9.34:9.5: Yo kho panavuso, abadho dukkhametam vuttam bhagavata.
an9.34:9.6: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanam.
an9.34:10.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.34:11.1: Iminapi kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sukham nibbanan”ti.
